title: Deleting Ports
body: I need to delete some ports on my network, are there any of the LoL ones I can delete such as HTTP Lol Login 80-80 TCP

replies.body:
I wouldn't recommend it, you'll like start getting blocked off from a variety of services that your network is connected to.  Check out this [guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8)for a list of ports League may need:



> 
>     5000 - 5500 UDP (League of Legends Game Client)
> 
>     8393 - 8400 TCP (Patcher and Maestro)
> 
>     2099 TCP (PVP.Net)
> 
>     5223 TCP (PVP.Net)
> 
>     5222 TCP (PVP.Net)
> 
>     80 TCP (HTTP Connections)
> 
>     443 TCP (HTTPS Connections)
> 
>     8088 UDP and TCP (Spectator Mode)
>
